documents.document: @Ballysbest if there's one man who could rock a bra on his hips, it's you Paudo.
When people use the term 'straw man' in a discussion, this is your cue to pop them into a canon and fire them off into oblivion forever.
@LeanneWoodfull I can never keep it up. Had all nighter last night. Came home at 3pm, napped until 6, and a 12 hour day tomorrow. *Stress*
@LindyMean they may well have no other choice!
@EvilPhil certainly some sort of mythical creature
A women, Teresa? Christ.
@seanreidsays you'd be surprised how often this has happened. I love the idea of you sitting in stunned silence for the rest of the day
They want a women who's pregnant but also a size 6. Say it with me: GET FUUUUUUUCKKKKKED https://t.co/XfyDtNfUeb
@SpoolandThimble this has winded me from laughing, and I don't know why
Join me as I celebrate escaping a group project - a fate worse than death. Sure it means a presentation and 5k essay, BUT ON MY OWN ðŸŽ‰ðŸŽ‰ðŸŽ‰
@Rob0Sullivan pretty pleased with myself. Even he'd have to give that kudos.
@Rob0Sullivan aka the Neil Prendeville story
@Rob0Sullivan not my sharpest moment. But still, you *could* make this happen, right? https://t.co/xsWzoblbTp
@Rob0Sullivan no no, back to the dolphins. How what when why
@Rob0Sullivan sorry what
When I rule the world, I'm going to put bras in place of pockets on men's clothes, and see how they like it.
@WhySharksMatter I might need to petition to get these to Ireland. So wrong, yet so right.
@SpellenBee Hmm. That might have swung it for me, I admire your willpower. TEACH ME YOUR WAYS.
@Rob0Sullivan I swore off it forever once a guy recognised me in work, because the crippling disappointment wasn't reason enough apparently.

@SpellenBee ...did he think you were five years old? So bad!
(how much did you consider it, because I would, like A LOT)
@SpellenBee See, really, I am holding out for my own show.
@Rob0Sullivan yes! This tweet sums up my feeling on it exactly. https://t.co/dLOtvDWSwl
@Rob0Sullivan what, my poster? I imagine that will bring you much success.
@Rob0Sullivan I'm using this as a quote on my poster for future gigs.
@Rob0Sullivan as should you :P
@Rob0Sullivan I only realised today I accidentally had a dry January, and I intend on making up for this ASAP.
"I'm hungry, what can I eat?" *sees unopened bag of apples* "Nah, I'm grand actually."
@Rob0Sullivan I think I meant 'drunk'... it's not always a negative though, in fairness.
@CiaraMPSI @Rob0Sullivan I just rely on my teenage sister to educate me through a series of eye rolls and laughs. Harsh training.
@Rob0Sullivan so we both make bad choices? Excellent :P
@Rob0Sullivan @CiaraMPSI I Urban Dictionary-ed it, but I wasn't gonna admit to that because I just want you guys to think I'm cool.
@MrStackpoole she was actually deadly and had great taste in dresses and deserves someone ridey. Maybe I am projecting, I dunno.
@MrStackpoole not so much for her, but more for the inevitable barrage of questions about being a comedian, especially as a woman.
@MrStackpoole now you mention it, both. But there was a UK comic on First Dates Hotel and it terrifies me.
@CiaraMPSI @Rob0Sullivan I have never heard this phrase before, and now I have, will attempt to use it as much as possible
@Rob0Sullivan Ha! Who's been spreading rumours? The cool kids all have longboards now, FYI.
@SpellenBee that night ended on a HANDSHAKE. 4) Got stranded at Bull Island at 3am. Thought he could 'fool' me into going dogging.
@SpellenBee 3) asked what gays bars are like, and said because I am bi, I could take him to one. I did, because I am a fool for pretty
@SpellenBee online dating?" I tell him to keep quiet. At the interval, he screams at me. "is it you're ashamed of me? YOU SLAG." etc
@SpellenBee I waited until he finished his chicken roll that it was Good Friday. 2) Met online, went to a comedy show. MC asks "anyone try
@SpellenBee then strap in because I have many, many stories for you. 1) He took me to Centra for coffee. We then sat in the rain.
@Rob0Sullivan We are massive rides, in fairness. And really, who are we to question the wisdom of a random Twitter app?
@tonyismyname @SpellenBee okay, I'm about 85% convinced now ðŸ˜…
@CiaraMPSI absolutely. I've started compiling a mood board for our debut video https://t.co/6n5xEvfss4
@CiaraMPSI the music will never die, let's bring this show on the road ðŸŽ¶ðŸŽ¶ https://t.co/0kxvWs3KnR
@jessiblah not enough credit is given to how shitty this feels, I think. You do whatever you've gotta do to get it out of your system
@jessiblah ah, that's such a lousy feeling, sorry to hear that! Hope you feel much better very soon, the heart-hurts are the worst!
@SpellenBee I'm 60% tempted then remember it's me, it will be a disaster, it will be televised, then I come to my senses.
@griffski maybe it's me, it maybe it's the tache. Either way, I'm trying to fix my bad choices.
@CiaraMPSI my heart dances for joy. But honestly, you do whatever you have to do to mind yourself, though keep in contact if you'd like to.
No, I'm not telling you a joke. Yes, I have met X. Heckling is not an interesting subject. Yes, I have a day job. No, don't start comedy.
Watching comedians on First Dates gives me heart palpitations.
@JJ5000 @CiaraMPSI cc me in on these plz
@griffski I... Not sure how to tell you, but... My vagine feels nothing for him. I AM SORRY.
@griffski babes, you know how bad I am at choices. This is like catnip for me.
@CiaraMPSI how many tweets of praise and cute dogs do I need to send you daily to keep you here?
@Rob0Sullivan sorry about the bad news, rob.
[Valentine] @sorobotic's Valentine should be @Rob0Sullivan! Who should be yours? via https://t.co/pIrftBNEtx https://t.co/7H5IQAZmrC
Today has been a great day, which I partially attribute to the fact I'm wearing shark print socks.
@thegarydoyle excuse me, I've some emails to write and a bakery to call
@thegarydoyle hypothetically, how much would it cost to hire this guy to egg a house in say... Palmerstown?
@thegarydoyle I want a celebration cake that looks like this man, then share the cake with him. Glorious.
@tonyismyname Yes and no. It would be more a Like Letter than love letter, which is an impressive admission for me. Still counts, right?
@tonyismyname I gasped and said "nonononono" out loud, and yet you're so right. One day, I'll have the guts to do like you.
@aideenblackwood teeth are actually the most inconsiderate pricks. My dental dramas have always been *just* before pay day ðŸ˜¤
@tonyismyname bring back the love letter, I say! You did the right thing. Just hope the wait isn't too painful.
Still better than the one Valentine's I was in a relationship, where I went to the cinema to cry in the dark at Shaun the Sheep. Good times.
I signed myself for a 10 hour tourism course on valentine's day, because I'm nothing if not a realist.
@SpellenBee 10/10 would subscribe. I will buy all your books. https://t.co/sqfuYFu9zA
@tonyismyname effort - you have tried. More than a lot of people could say. That's proper ballsy, so no matter what the outcome, well done.
@tonyismyname Once something like this is finally set in motion, it kinda steamrolls. The anxiety is understandable. At least you made an
@SpellenBee you are the hero we need, but don't deserve.
@tonyismyname I'm rooting for you. I totally get what you mean though, as scary as it is, not knowing can be the worst.
@tonyismyname I'm so invested in this. Fingers crossed for you!
How badly could you want a free holiday? Fucking hell. https://t.co/KD82nTIRF5
@SpellenBee that's life the way it should be.
@NealP55 in some ways, a pasta dinner is my porn
I've set up a splash zone. Stand back.
If anyone is craving some intense, harrowing Sunday night entertainment, I'm about to eat an obscene amount of pasta.
@bernasher @NursepollyRgn you're absolutely right. saw screenshots of it, and it's her usual poison. She causes genuine harm to people imo
Stayed in work an extra hour off the clock to avoid work at home. Smart.
@mgtscott oh, stop. I'm roaring at the telly when she's on. How can someone be so woefully devoid of empathy or understanding?!
I'm asking this as a personal favour. If you give a shit about the women in your life, DO NOT CLICK.
@1980worldchamp yup. I think it's genuinely harmful.
RAPE IS NEVER THE FAULT OF THE VICTIM. YOU DID NOTHING WRONG.
knowing it's even been published has me on edge and feeling sick. Sexual assault survivors - please know she is wrong and poisonous.
Please please don't go sharing or clicking on the N*amh H*ran piece. Her trash opinion is so fucking damaging to women.
@darthellen @ciaragemmam you too, it's good to have a space to say "fuck that shit" and be heard x
@ciaragemmam @darthellen took me 3 years. Even now, if I read her guff on a bad day, it's enough to set me off for weeks of self loathing.
@darthellen we're our own worst enemies at times of trauma like sexual assault, and she is salt in the fucking wound.
@darthellen because if I had heard some of this shit in my early 20s I'd have used it as a stick to beat myself with even more than I did
@darthellen she's fucking poison. I'm so terrified of young women assimilating her victim blaming trash and severely damaging their MH.
@GoChaela she's fucking poisonous that one.
@incogellen I think I would too tbf
Am I Cranky Or Do I Just Need A Cup Of Tea?: An Autobiography
@SpellenBee when Emer called him out on cheating, he was the one that went on a sulky killing spree. Get a fat grip, mate.
@SpellenBee hahah! I think I'm doing my next Headstuff lecture on this. So much compelling evidence.
@annapickard and I know he's surrounded by sycophants, but how is nobody around him saying "is this a bit much, no?"
@annapickard just been having this chat. How can he have such absolute power - and so immediate? Esp compared to here and UK.
@CiaraMPSI I do feel there's an obligation to keep myself educated and informed, and maybe figure out ways I can actively help
